name: BioShock Infinite: Burial at Sea - Episode Two
name_original: BioShock Infinite: Burial at Sea - Episode Two
description:
BioShock Infinite: Burial at Sea - Episode Two is an action-shooter game developed by Irrational Games. It was originally released in 2014. 2K Games published the game. On review aggregator Metacritic, BioShock Infinite: Burial at Sea - Episode Two has a score of 82. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play BioShock Infinite: Burial at Sea - Episode Two on PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360. The game is sold via Steam.
